name: Domination (Kremlebot)
description:
Fight against a large army of people and prove to the whole world that Godzilla is absolute domination. 

How to play:

  • Spawn two Godzilla
  • make a move
  • Click on button "next turn"
  • Repeat

Godzilla's can only attack with melee

Every enemy unit has a special type of attack

After dead Godzilla's can reborn, if the egg lives during two turns

Important: if, when generating a map, the movement of a unit is completely blocked - press restart
